from sortedcontainers import *


class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        # max (
        # (max(xi+yi)-min(xi+yi)),
        # (max(xi-yi)-min(xi-yi))
        # )
        P = SortedList()
        M = SortedList()
        for x, y in points:
            P.add(x + y)
            M.add(x - y)

        ans = inf
        for x, y in points:
            P.remove(x + y)
            M.remove(x - y)
            ans = min(ans, max(P[-1] - P[0], M[-1] - M[0]))
            P.add(x + y)
            M.add(x - y)

        return ans
